arts.ttl: Sunderland vs. Wolves: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash between Sunderland and Wolverhampton Wanderers, Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head records and previous meetings between the two clubs.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Wolves - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Premier League clash between Sunderland and Wolverhampton Wanderers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Le Bris faced with Alderete, Sadiki decisions: Predicted Sunderland lineup vs. Wolves
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Sunderland could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Wolverhampton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Pereira to persist with back four: Predicted Wolves lineup vs. Sunderland
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Wolverhampton Wanderers could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Sunderland.

arts.ttl: Sunderland's Regis Le Bris issues his honest thoughts on Wolves ahead of Saturday
arts.sum: Wolves are set to take on Sunderland away from home on Saturday afternoon as the Old Gold look for their first win of the Premier League season, and Regis Le Bris has given his verdict on the side. Regis Le Bris has heaped praise on both Wolves and Vitor Pereira ahead of their Premier League clash this weekend.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Wolves predictions: Survival rivals can put on a show
arts.sum: Sunderland host Wolves in the Premier League on Saturday and James Milton expects an open contest at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Wolves hoping to overcome ominous Sunderland record in search for first Premier League win
arts.sum: Wolves take on Sunderland at 3 PM BST on Saturday, and the Old Gold will be hoping their past history does not repeat against the Black Cats. Seven years on, the two sides will meet in league action once more, but while the Wanderers do not typically do well against Sunderland, their away record vs the Black Cats is even worse.
